TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You are responsible for the lives of billions of aliens and they revolt and kill you within days.

OjalÃƒÂ¡ yo hablaba espaÃƒÂ±ol.

Did you translate that using Google Translate?

Granted. You can only say the word espaÃƒÂ±ol.

I wish I was a wittle babby.

Did you translate that using Google Translate?

Granted. You can only say the word espaÃƒÂ±ol.

I wish I was a wittle babby.

Granted. However, mudkips now hate babbys and they sacrifice you to the mudkipz god.

I wish I didn't have oral fixation.

I don't know what the hell that is so you get antimatter instead.

I wish Absolute zero was achievable.

Granted. Someone turns it into a superweapon and freezes most of humankind.

I wish I could catch them all.

Granted. Now what?

I wish I hadn't added IRC to the forums on my list of addictions.

Granted. Now you will forever live with the desire to add IRC to the forums on your list of addictions, but are forever unable to and never know why.

I wish I had some badges from some forum challenges.

Granted, but they cause some kind of error and your account is deleted by the NSA for suspicious activity, in order to sign up again you must first hack into the NSA database and release your account restrictions.

I wish the internet wasn't so un-private.

Granted. The internet no longer exists.

I wish for the internet to exist again.

404 wish not found.... *Universe implodes*

I wish MLP didn't exist... (Yes, I am an anti-brony.)

I don't know what the hell that is so you get antimatter instead.

I wish Absolute zero was achievable.

But..you didn't grant my wish :C

..G..granted...I honestly can't think of a way to ruin this wish because you're already dumb enough for being an anti-brony. So...You're IQ is then lowered even more? Yeah, that. Let's move on from MLP now.

I wish I had good friends outside of the internet.

Edited May 30, 2014 by Thesonicgalaxy

Granted! You'll meet them in school in August!

I wish Kessler syndrome happened. (For science)

Granted. We can now no longer leave Earth. Ever.

I wish for this Flareon to cool down.

Granted! But I am so cooled down I leave Earth inhabitable after I made an Ice age after so much cooling down.

I wish people were more logical.

Granted. People are only the slightest bit more logical.

I wish to die

Someone attempts to assassinate you, but another person gets in the way, and dies. The assassin is caught. You live.

I wish for water.

Granted. It's mixed with poison and you die.

I wish Poland could into space.

Poland engineers play Kerbal Space Program.

I wish to have more time.

Granted. You have more time to be a baby. You waste all of it babbling and chewing on things.

I wish I was a baby forever.

Granted, unfortunately you made some more clone even more than expected

I wish weak witch to use curse a smoother way.

Edited May 31, 2014 by WinkAllKerb''
adjustement that compute ;) original was denied thanks red for noticing me that i not formaluted well ;)

Denied?! Does not compute.

Your wish is granted. You have a lubricated mouse for using Curse.

I wish I didn't have to work this weekend.

Granted by empathy *editon* then you feel the pain all around the rock like never before and like it's your own because you have no focus thanks to usual week work. *editoff*

I wish longer night & day near each pole.

Edited May 31, 2014 by WinkAllKerb''

I'm not sure you understand how this game works. You grant the wish, then describe how the wish is corrupted so it's not such a good thing. Like so:

Granted. Earth's axial tilt goes to 90 degrees, causing tremendous upheaval in weather systems across the globe.

Edit: The irony is palpable in describing how to play the game then forgetting to make my own wish.

Edited May 31, 2014 by Red Iron Crown

Granted, you made a wish by subconscient ommission but it has unexpected result.

Wish consciouness and subconsciouness to be more friendly each other.

Granted. They now both hate your guts.

I wish for a dish of fish named Trish.
